1.0.0.name: wordpress/pearl-crm-contact-form-integration
1.0.0.description: The Brightpearl SmartForms plugin for WordPress allows you to quickly and easily insert lead capture forms to your blog posts or pages. Once installed and configured you can drop your chosen contact form in to your blog simply by typing {Brightpearl_smartform}.
